plot: Set in the future Kei and Yuri are Trouble Consultants for the 3WA; codenamed "Lovely Angels", but they are known throughout the galaxy as the Dirty Pair. They always solve their case, but not without causing collateral damage and mayhem.
opening_theme: "By Yourself" by Keiko Mai / Tsuneiku Waizumi
ending_theme: "Summer Time From Autumn" by Keiko Mai / Akiya Nakazaki
"Aki Kara no Summertime" by Yuuko Nitou
